alert.note: Alert for White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 2:10PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central White Pine and southeastern Eureka Counties through 245 PM PDT... At 209 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Garden Pass to near Diamond Valley to 6 miles west of Eureka Airport. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Diamond Valley, Eureka Airport and Garden Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
